titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the chosen and representative body of England assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of L.C. Iohn Lilburne a free man of England
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Fragment of a larger work? P. 9 has signature A1.
Signed and dated on p. 11: Newgate, Iune 16.1646. John Lilburne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
